description:
A cross-platform music app using YouTube Music for backend


Change logs
- Mini floating player in desktop app
- New AppImage package for Linux desktop app
- Local tracking listening history and analytics
- Auto backup (Android only)
- Vote for SimpMusic Lyrics
- Fix download playlist
- Fix Spotify Canvas, Spotify Login
What's Changed
- v1.0.1-hf: Hot fix FOSS build by @maxrave-dev in #1549
- Migrate to new KMP best practice by @maxrave-dev in #1601
- add: device info to issue template by @CrazyWolf13 in #1585
- v1.0.2: Add tracking local and analysis like Last.fm in app by @maxrave-dev in #1610
- v1.0.2: Auto backup by @maxrave-dev in #1616
- Feature/desktop mini player by @spiicez21 in #1614
- v1.0.2: New version by @maxrave-dev in #1611
New Contributors
- @spiicez21 made their first contribution in #1614
Full Changelog: v1.0.1...v1.0.2
